channel.title: [PI/DSPK] Runelive Release, Most recent [PI/DSPK]
channel.description:
[CENTER]Well hi there, I'm Mod Dave A of RuneLive Owner along side of Afflicti0n, RuneLive has had it's run, but now it's time we closed, I'm sorry for all who played, I know I did a lot of stuff half assed before you say "OMFG BAD CODED", yeah and i also know it's not much diff then dspk, but atleast it's got players, I only used this source while developering, my real server Elysium, witch is still in progress.
[QUOTE][CENTER][IMG]http://img413.imageshack.us/img413/5711/runelive.png[/img]
[B] Runelive/Euroscape is back, and better then ever! This server has been around a long time, peaking 500 players very often. We are here to bring you an experience of a life time. We feel that your experience shouldn't be a cake walk, but it definitely should be far from boring.
[B][CENTER]Features: ~Pvp Armors (All effects and specials) ~Chaotic weapons(Works just like RS) ~A slayer based economy! This makes slayer one of the most useful aspects of the game, most items will be obtained from slayer. ~Tormented Demons- Correct Emotes/GFX works just like rs, Custom spot for them. ~Corperal Beast- Correct Emotes/GFX drops spirit shields/ sigils just like rs! ~Staff of Light- Has the 50% damage deduction special! ~Clipped Following. ~Combat following (Melee/Range/Mage) ~Awesome custom RFD quest, fight your way to the amazing barrow gloves! ~604 Gameplay in a 317! ~Curse Prayers work exactly in RS, EVERY SINGLE ONE OF THEM! ~Current RS Firecape emote. ~Skillcape Emotes. ~ 1 Wave Firecape. ~Amazing Staff ~PERFECTED Pking. ~100% Bridding/ Item Switching. ~Barrows and effects. ~Pk points, EP (Earning Potential) that gives you a chance to get pvp items on drops! ~Perfect Xp rates, doesn't take very long for a 99 combat skill. ~100% Dragon claws with perfected emote. ~100% all godsword specials- Zgs freezes, Sgs regains pray/hp, Bgs lowers defence, Ags- Amazing hits. ~Absolutely and positively NO DUPES. It is absolutely impossible to dupe on our server. ~Friendly Gameplay. ~THERE IS NO "DONATOR ONLY" ITEMS! Anyone can use anything if they have the proper requirements! ~Shops are located in varrock, where they would actually be! Gives you a more "real" gaming expierience. ~All spirit shields and their effects! Divine- Deducts 30% damage. Elysian- 70% chance to deduct 30% damage. Arcane- +20 Magic Attack Bonus. Spectral- +30 magic defence bonus! ~Amazing custom spot for tormented demon ladder. You must make your way through the wilderness to get to 13 wild, and avoid pkers! ~A perfect economy. ~Slayer helmet gives 50% extra exp when doing slayer! ~Lock exp..for all those pures who want to use whips :) ~Every single skill works![/CENTER][/B] [COLOR="Red"][CENTER] [B]Curses & Specials[/B][/CENTER][/COLOR]
[CENTER][IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/1014121/runelive.gif[/img]
[COLOR="Red"][B]Oh? See this, this my friend is what we call; a perfect Staff of Light![/B][/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2dv6fia.png[/img][/CENTER] [COLOR="Red"][B][CENTER]
Idk about you, But i'm getting tired of the whole "Mage book tele" crisis. I'd much rather[/CENTER][/B] [/COLOR]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/14sk6cz.png[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR="Red"][B]Styke worms[/B][/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2mcgksi.png[/img][/CENTER][/QUOTE]
uploading now, for any info add me:
[email]mod.runelive@live.com[/email]
Downloads Client & Server: [url=http://uppit.com/y365yh91memw/RuneLive_Package.rar]UppIT - Free File Sharing - RuneLive Package.rar[/url]
Download Cache: [url=http://uppit.com/epggbiwj27z0/RuneLive_Cache.rar]UppIT - Free File Sharing - RuneLive_Cache.rar[/url] - place the cache in ur c:/ drive.
we maxed 552 players, and over 2.6k of donations a month
I am Dave™ of rune-server, Kinky-Whip of Mopar, Dave of RuneLocus, no one else has my permission to release this anywhere else.
P.S I also will report flame, I know it#s bad but atlest it got players unlike some other server's that are done much better then this,I also do not expect many people to download it, but have fun guys, Cache is coming maybe in an hour after my dinner. LEAVE A COMMENT OR I REMOVE
some extra info for people who don't read :L
Ok for windows 7 / 64 bit: [CODE]@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server EXIT[/CODE]
change the exit to pause it should now look like [CODE]@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/CODE]
windows vista/xp/32 bit: [CODE]@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files (X86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server EXIT[/CODE]
change the exit to pause it should now look like [CODE]@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/CODE]
now to fix client go to the client.java
search for [CODE][runelivepk656.no-ip.org[/CODE]
change to:
[CODE]127.0.0.1[/CODE]
now search for: [CODE] socketStream = new RSSocket(this, openSocket(5555));[/CODE]
change to:
[CODE] socketStream = new RSSocket(this, openSocket(43594));[/CODE]
save, compile, to use the auto restart
use the sar.bat, if you windows 7 user / 64 bit no need to change
if your a windows xp/vista use: [CODE]@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server EXIT[/CODE]
[CODE] ::Copyright © MMVIII all rights reserved 2008 @echo off title Server Automated Restarter :start set time=[COLOR="#ff0000"]18000[/COLOR] this is seconds so this is 3 hours, each hour is 6,000 seconds. start run.bat :loop cls IF %time% GTR 0 ( set /a time=%time% - 1 set /a min=%time%/60 echo Next Restart In %time% Seconds. echo %time% Seconds is %min% Minutes. ping 127.0.0.1 -n 2 > NUL goto loop ) taskkill /f /im java.exe cls goto start ::Made By RSC/Logical[/CODE]
how to compile in client (windows 7/ 64bit) in 2. compile 21 change: [CODE] @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/CODE]
to
[CODE]@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_[COLOR="#ff0000"]YOUR JDK VERSION HERE[/COLOR]\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/CODE]
for windows vista/xp/32bit: in 2. compile 21 change: [CODE] @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/CODE]
[CODE] @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_[COLOR="#ff0000"]YOUR JDK VERSION[/COLOR]\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/CODE]
how to compile server sided:
windows 7/ 64bit: change: [CODE]@echo off "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause EXIT[/CODE]
to: [CODE]@echo off "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_[COLOR="#ff0000"]YOUR JDK VERSION[/COLOR]\bin\javac" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause [/CODE]
Windows vista/XP/32 bit change: [QUOTE]@echo off "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause EXIT[/QUOTE]
to [QUOTE]@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_[COLOR="#ff0000"]YOUR JDK VERSION[/COLOR]\bin\javac" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause [/QUOTE][/CENTER]

item.title: [PI/DSPK] Runelive Release, Most recent [PI/DSPK]
item.dc:creator: @CommunityX CommunityX
item.description:
@CommunityX wrote:

Great release.

I’ve been coding this for a while now, making it my own (Don’t worry, I’ll credit you), and we’re nearing our release date, we’ve added quiet a bit, moved a few things, and combined this with another source we previously made, and hopefully it’ll turn out for the best.

Thanks again, rep++

Read full topic
